attributes.action: The BBC should have a password system to access any BBC channels.
attributes.additional_details: As not all people have a TV etc to watch BBC programes.
attributes.background: Force the BBC to have a password system to access any BBC channels, to avoid any unwanted BBC license fee inspectors harassing people just for having a TV etc.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is an operational decision for the BBC.

You might like to sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/567521
